actions.name: v_emergency_exit
actions.label: Emergency Exit Seat
actions.description: Press LShift + H to engage emergency exit

actions.name: v_view_dynamic_zoom_abs_toggle
actions.label: Dynamic Zoom Toggle (abs.)
actions.description: Holds the dynamic zoom as long as the button is held

actions.name: v_toggle_relative_mouse_mode
actions.label: Cycle mouse mode (VJoy / Relative)
actions.description: Switches the mouse behavior for ship rotations between a relative (FPS style) and a Vjoy mode.

actions.name: v_strafe_longitudinal_invert
actions.label: Throttle - Forward / Back Invert
actions.description: Inverts Strafe Longitudinal Absolute Axis Half (Neutral - Backward)

actions.name: v_transform_cycle
actions.label: Cycle Configuration
actions.description: Cycle between the vehicle's expanded and retracted configurations.

actions.name: v_atc_request
actions.label: Request Landing
actions.description: Contacts ATC and other landing services.

actions.name: v_ifcs_reset_gmeter_max
actions.label: Reset Flight Accelerometer
actions.description: Resets the max endured Gs for the accelerometer.

actions.name: v_target_toggle_lock_index_1
actions.label: Pin Index 1 - Lock / Unlock Pinned Target

actions.name: v_target_toggle_lock_index_2
actions.label: Pin Index 2 - Lock / Unlock Pinned Target

actions.name: v_target_toggle_lock_index_3
actions.label: Pin Index 3 - Lock / Unlock Pinned Target

actions.name: v_target_toggle_pin_index_1
actions.label: Pin Index 1 - Pin / Unpin Selected Target

actions.name: v_target_toggle_pin_index_2
actions.label: Pin Index 2 - Pin / Unpin Selected Target

actions.name: v_target_toggle_pin_index_3
actions.label: Pin Index 3 - Pin / Unpin Selected Target

actions.name: v_target_toggle_pin_index_1_hold
actions.label: Pin Index 1 - Pin / Unpin Selected Target (Hold)

actions.name: v_target_toggle_pin_index_2_hold
actions.label: Pin Index 2 - Pin / Unpin Selected Target (Hold)

actions.name: v_target_toggle_pin_index_3_hold
actions.label: Pin Index 3 - Pin / Unpin Selected Target (Hold)

actions.name: v_look_ahead_enable
actions.label: Enable / Disable Look Ahead
actions.description: Enables and disables Look Ahead Mode

actions.name: v_look_ahead_start_target_tracking
actions.label: Enable / Disable Target Padlock (Toggle, Hold)
actions.description: Allows you to track a locked target with your head

actions.name: v_target_tracking_auto_zoom
actions.label: Auto Zoom On Selected Target On / Off (Toggle, Hold)
actions.description: Allows you to enable and disable auto zoom on selected targets.

actions.name: v_target_cycle_in_view_reset
actions.label: Cycle Lock - In View - Under Reticle

actions.name: v_target_cycle_pinned_reset
actions.label: Cycle Lock - Pinned - Reset to First

actions.name: v_target_cycle_attacker_reset
actions.label: Cycle Lock - Attackers - Reset to Closest

actions.name: v_target_cycle_hostile_reset
actions.label: Cycle Lock - Hostiles - Reset to Closest

actions.name: v_target_cycle_friendly_reset
actions.label: Cycle Lock - Friendlies - Reset to Closest

actions.name: v_target_cycle_all_reset
actions.label: Cycle Lock - All - Reset to Closest

actions.name: v_target_cycle_subitem_reset
actions.label: Cycle Lock - Sub-Target - Reset to Main Target

actions.name: v_inc_scan_focus_level
actions.label: Increase Scanning Angle
actions.description: Increase the angle of the Scanning Cone

actions.name: v_dec_scan_focus_level
actions.label: Decrease Scanning Angle
actions.description: Decrease the angle of the Scanning Cone

actions.name: v_salvage_toggle_gimbal_mode
actions.label: Salvage Mode Gimbal (Toggle)
actions.description: Toggle between gimbled and fixed salvage targeting modes.

actions.name: v_salvage_increase_beam_spacing
actions.label: Increase Beam Spacing
actions.description: Increase the spacing between the Vulture's two salvage heads.

actions.name: v_salvage_decrease_beam_spacing
actions.label: Decrease Beam Spacing
actions.description: Decrease the spacing between the Vulture's two salvage heads.

actions.name: v_salvage_beam_spacing_rel
actions.label: Relative Beam Spacing
actions.description: Adjust the relative spacing between the Vulture's two salvage heads.

actions.name: v_salvage_beam_spacing_abs
actions.label: Absolute Beam Spacing
actions.description: Adjust the absolute spacing between the Vulture's two salvage heads.

actions.name: v_salvage_toggle_beam_spacing_axis
actions.label: Salvage Beam Axis (Toggle)
actions.description: Set the orientation axis of the salvage beam to vertical or horizontal.

actions.name: v_salvage_cycle_modifiers_left
actions.label: Cycle Left Salvage Modifiers
actions.description: Cycle through available modifiers on the left salvage head or salvage turret.

actions.name: v_salvage_cycle_modifiers_right
actions.label: Cycle Right Salvage Modifiers
actions.description: Cycle through available modifiers on the right salvage head or salvage turret.

actions.name: turret_toggle_mouse_mode
actions.label: Toggle Turret Mouse Movement (VJoy, FPS style)
actions.description: Enables / Disables relative mouse mode for turrets

actions.name: turret_limiter_toggle
actions.label: Turret - Speed Limiter - On/Off (Hold/Toggle)
actions.description: Toggles the limiter for the rotational turret speed

actions.name: turret_limiter_rel_increase
actions.label: Turret - Speed Limiter - Increase (rel)
actions.description: Increases the speed of the turret.

actions.name: turret_limiter_rel_decrease
actions.label: Turret - Speed Limiter - Decrease (rel)
actions.description: Decreases the speed of the turret.

actions.name: v_weapon_pip_combination_type_set_single
actions.label: PIP Combination Type: Set One PIP Per Weapon

actions.name: v_weapon_pip_combination_type_set_combined_weapon_group
actions.label: PIP Combination Type: Set One PIP Per Weapon Type

actions.name: v_weapon_convergence_distance_rel
actions.label: Manual Convergence Distance (rel.)
actions.description: Sets the manual convergence distance on a relative axis

actions.name: v_weapon_convergence_distance_set_default
actions.label: Manual Convergence Distance - Reset
actions.description: Resets the Manual Convergence Distance to the default value

actions.name: v_weapon_preset_qid_jammer
actions.label: Weapon Presets - Set Quantum Jammers (short range)
actions.description: Weapon Presets - Set Quantum Jammers (short range)

actions.name: v_weapon_preset_qid_pulse
actions.label: Weapon Presets - Set Quantum Snares / Pulse (long range)
actions.description: Weapon Presets - Set Quantum Snares / Pulse (long range)

actions.name: v_weapon_bombing_hud_range_increase
actions.label: Bombs - Increase HUD Range
actions.description: Increases range by one step in the bomb alignment HUD

actions.name: v_weapon_bombing_hud_range_reset
actions.label: Bombs - Reset HUD Range
actions.description: Resets to the default range in the bomb alignment HUD

actions.name: v_weapon_countermeasure_decoy_launch
actions.label: Decoy - Launch Burst (tap), Set and Launch Burst (hold)

actions.name: v_weapon_countermeasure_decoy_burst_increase
actions.label: Decoy - Increase Burst Size (tap)
actions.description: Increases the burst size by one.

actions.name: v_weapon_countermeasure_decoy_burst_decrease
actions.label: Decoy - Decrease Burst Size (tap)
actions.description: Decreases the burst size by one.

actions.name: v_weapon_countermeasure_decoy_launch_panic
actions.label: Decoy - Panic Launch (tap)
actions.description: Launches a large percentage of the countermeasure magazine.

actions.name: v_cycle_pitch_ladder_mode
actions.label: Cycle Pitch Ladder Mode
actions.description: Cycles the pitch ladder mode between off, HUD, look direction and mixed.

actions.name: visor_wipe
actions.label: Wipe Helmet Visor
actions.description: Quickly wipe your helmet visor to improve visibility

actions.name: weapon_zeroing_decrease
actions.label: Weapon Zeroing Decrease
actions.description: Adjust the weapon scope to accommodate a closer target distance into sighting.

actions.name: weapon_zeroing_increase
actions.label: Weapon Zeroing Increase / Auto
actions.description: Adjust the weapon scope to accommodate a farther target distance into sighting.

actions.name: visor_wipe
actions.label: Wipe Helmet Visor
actions.description: Quickly wipe your helmet visor to improve visibility

actions.name: free_thirdperson_camera
actions.label: Free View Camera (Hold)
actions.description: Holding allows free view camera in third person

actions.name: ship_recall
actions.label: Recall Last Vehicle
actions.description: Activate ship recall on the last flying vehicle used

actions.name: tractor_beam_increase_distance
actions.label: Tractor Beam - Increase Distance
actions.description: Increases the target distance for an object controlled with the Tractor Beam.

actions.name: tractor_beam_decrease_distance
actions.label: Tractor Beam - Decrease Distance
actions.description: Decreases the target distance for an object controlled with the Tractor Beam.

actions.name: visor_wipe
actions.label: Wipe Helmet Visor
actions.description: Quickly wipe your helmet visor to improve visibility

actions.name: v_view_dynamic_zoom_abs_toggle
actions.label: Dynamic Zoom Toggle (abs.)
actions.description: Holds the dynamic zoom as long as the button is held

actions.name: v_lock_rotation
actions.label: Lock Pitch / Yaw Movement (Toggle / Hold)
actions.description: While active no rotational inputs are allowed to your ship. This is useful for arresting movement when you lost control using a mouse.

actions.name: cycle_chat_lobby
actions.label: @ui_CIUIChatCycleLobby
actions.description: Press to cycle through subscribed lobbies in chat

actions.name: emote_launch
actions.label: Confirm Launch
actions.description: Confirms the launch of the vehicle
